code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic input_a,   // 1-bit input
    input logic input_b,   // 1-bit input
    output logic out       // 1-bit output
);
    // Combinational logic: 2-input AND gate
    always @(*) begin
        out = input_a & input_b; // Perform AND operation
    end
endmodule
[DONE]
